column4: For the most part, you cannot telnet to an ordinary switch, being a layer 2 device, but with more advanced switchs, for instance Cisco ones, they have a console port on the back, you then use hyper terminal and a rollover (Not crossover) to connect to it and alter the settings, for instance, enable telnet connections. Your switch though might not allow telnet connections at all. What brand is it?
Yeah, is the switch seccond hand? The last owner might have disabled it.
Yeah, even if you can get into it's console port, it'd be password protected. Have fun :)
